title: New: Flying Lotus â€“ Ideas, Drafts & Loops
content:
In celebration of reaching 300,000 followers on Twitter, Flying Lotus has dropped a new collection of demos, rough beats and ideas for free download.

Featuring Thundercat, Baths, Earl, Yeezus and Mapei, as well as his own projects, Captain Murphy and The Underachievers.

Grab a free download here.

Hey u guys are gonna share this folder right? Pls pass it around. Pass to the homies. Rt the hell out of it.

Let me show u somefinnnn
